short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Chrome extension allows for the sharing of screens while working in the ExamMed ExamRoom.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Once downloaded and installed, click the Share Screen button in the ExamRoom to start broadcasting your screen.
